description.zh-CN: 一个高级的看板组件，用于任务和工作流管理，具有跨多个列的拖放卡片组织功能。支持卡片创建、编辑、删除和列自定义，实现灵活的项目管理和团队协作。
description.en-US: An advanced kanban board component for task and workflow management, featuring drag-and-drop card organization across multiple columns. Supports card creation, editing, deletion, and column customization for flexible project management and team collaboration.

description.zh-CN: 视觉上吸引人的看板实现，具有流畅的拖放交互、清晰的列分离和响应式卡片布局。实现高效的任务跟踪和工作流可视化，促进团队生产力管理。
description.en-US: A visually appealing kanban board implementation featuring smooth drag-and-drop interactions, clear column separation, responsive card layouts, and intuitive task organization. Enables efficient task tracking and workflow visualization for productive team management and collaboration.

description.zh-CN: 功能丰富的现代风格看板，包含任务详情、进度条、头像、标签等完整元素
description.en-US: Feature-rich modern kanban with task details, progress bars, avatars, tags, and complete metadata
